I'm very powerful of course very wise of

they have created God in their own image

a mind that does not think like your

you will become like them because evil

this force this power

are tremendous the force of their

cause in this circumstance it changes

it changes your motivations because you

hatred gives rise to violence and

this is a trap you see it is a

there is a greater wisdom living within

it is free it is pure it is clear it is

you are still connected to God through

you cannot escape from it you cannot

your connection to God and your

you cannot fulfill yourself and you
